Welcome to the PIPER IPE Entry Survey

This survey will ask you questions about your experience with Interprofessional Education. All information collected is anonymous, please answer truthfully. {br}{br}Please maximize your browser window and click Continue to begin.

Read the following statements carefully and split them into three piles: a pile for statements you {b}Disagree{/b} with, a pile for statements you {b}Agree{/b} with, and a pile for the rest ({b}Neutral{/b}).{br}{br}You can either drag the statements into one of the three piles or press 1, 2, or 3 on your keyboard. Changes can be made later.{br}{br}If you want to read these instructions a second time, press the Help button in the bottom right corner.

Just like before, select the two statements you most disagree with and place them on the far left side of the score sheet.{br}{br}{b}c){/b} Next, select the statements you second most agree/disagree with and place them in an appropriate location on the score sheet. Follow this procedure for all statements in the {b}Agree{/b} and {b}Disagree{/b} piles.{br}{br}{b}d){/b} Finally, read the {b}Neutral{/b} statements again and arrange them in the remaining open boxes of the score sheet.{br}{br}{b}Tip:{/b} After placing a statement on the score sheet, you can hover your mouse over it to read the statement in full.
